title: Armenia Secures Key U.S. Approval for $500 Million AI Supercomputer Hub
description: Armenia's $500-million artificial intelligence and supercomputer hub project, developed by Firebird with government collaboration, has moved forward after US regulators approved the transfer of advanced Nvidia chips following a personal appeal from Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan.
content:

title: Alphabet races toward US$4 trillion valuation
description: Alphabet closed in on a US$4 trillion valuation on Monday, set to become only the fourth company to enter the exclusive club, as the Google parent rides an artificial intelligence-driven rally.
